page.title: 20Filming Near Braddock
page.content: In 1982 the pretty little church in Braddock,near West Taphouse was used in the filming of{"My Cousin Rachel." It is a story by Daphne Du Maurier and was serialised by the B.B.C. Many of the local community and some children from Braddock School were used as{"extras."}They were paid Â£30.00 daily.Children were paid Â£15.00 daily.They had to be ready for action by 8:00a.m. The Bellringers from Braddock church were used in the filming and great excitment was felt by all when we watched the filmed results on TV. Many of the film crew lodged at local Bed & Breakfast establishments. Only two years previously,Boconnoc House had featured in the filming of { "Poldark"}Series so the community were not totally new to the film business! By Upper Juniors
